name: cors-buster
description: When you need a file, but the headers ain't good, who you gonna call? CORS Buster!

scripts.build: mkdir build && cp index.js build/index.js && cp -r node_modules build/node_modules && cp -r package.json build/package.json && cp -r README.md build/README.md && cp -r micro-cors.js build/micro-cors.js

author: William Hilton <wmhilton@gmail.com>
